data.what_is:
Adlucent is the performance marketing agency that proves outperformance has no limit. Powered by our purpose-built platform, Deep Search(tm), Adlucent unifies the best of human and machine for a scientific approach to marketing. 

We work transparently in partnership with B2C and B2B retailers and brands to create custom, predictive programs that drive ever-better outcomes. 

Our services include paid search, shopping, social, Amazon, display media, video, performance creative, consulting, and measurement.

Headquartered in Austin, Texas, Adlucent is part of Advantage Solutions and ranked one of the top marketing companies in the U.S. by AdAge.
data.product_description: Adlucent is a SaaS solution that offers advertisers a unified platform to create & scale product ad campaigns across multiple channels

initial_reviews.review_title: Adlucent team is great at their job
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Adlucent?
We Used Adlucent services for B2C lead generation. Their team is very experienced and professional. They delivered what they promised within the given budgets. Kudos to Adlucent.

What do you dislike about Adlucent?
Although the results were delivered, on a few instances, we faced some problems with the leads but their team was very prompt at solving them. Strongly recommended.

What problems is Adlucent solving and how is that benefiting you?
Adlucent helped generate B2C leads through search advertising. Their team took care of everything and I didn't have to worry about anything. Results were delivered and that's all that matters.

What do you like best about Adlucent?
Adlucent is a really good SaaS solution for advertisers who are looking to promote their products or services online across various digital channels.

What do you dislike about Adlucent?
I have been using Adlucent for the last six months and haven't found anything negative about it yet.

What problems is Adlucent solving and how is that benefiting you?
Adlucent helps our team to solve the problems related to product feed management, eventually leading us to fulfil the marketing objectives of our company. It helps us to effectively run search advertising campaigns for our organization's services and gives us a great reach.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Digital Marketing Executive | Paid Ads Specialist

initial_reviews.review_title: Effective, but a black box service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Adlucent?
The team is very friendly and they assist with our needs. They normally take care of tasks within 24-48 hours of making the request.

What do you dislike about Adlucent?
The service is a black box so you have no control or visibility into what is going on. A lot of small changes would be much faster to make with another software.

Recommendations to others considering Adlucent:
I would look at other self-service options unless you are not a product feed expert.

What problems is Adlucent solving and how is that benefiting you?
Product feed management for major digital platforms. We have been able to manage a large assortment of items.
